Title: Race to Space
Plot: On the heels of Masters? proposal that they participate in the sexual response study, Johnson considers the best course of action to keep her job ? only to find she no longer has one. The study has been forced out of the hospital and Masters believes Johnson is to blame. As Johnson fights to save her job and struggles to care for her kids, Masters moves his study to a brothel. But Masters soon discovers that the chaos of the cathouse is unmanageable without Johnson?s help.
